user_types.name: un_guest
user_types.description: Any registered user is by default a guest, minimally has username and email address

user_types.name: un_staff
user_types.description: A temporary label placed on Guest/Customer/Supplier/Candidate visiting our premises

user_types.name: ut_customer
user_types.description: A guest that is from companies, our business sells and do transact with. Added Guest info for visiting purpose; includes, contact and company association.

user_types.name: ut_supplier
user_types.description: A guest that is from companies, our business buys and do transact with. Added Guest info for visiting purpose; includes, contact and company association.

user_types.name: ut_candidate
user_types.description: A guest that is a potential hire into company. Added Guest info for visiting purpose; includes, contact and job application.

user_types.name: ut_newbie
user_types.description: A temporary label placed on Guest converting to be a frequent patron to our premises, going thru onboarding program. Added access to onboarding module.

user_types.name: ut_tpc
user_types.description: Post asignment after onboarding, remains a guest that is from companies, our organization contract service from, and will be part of and perform jobs in the company. Guest is known as Third Party Contractor

user_types.name: ut_employee
user_types.description: Post asignment after onboarding, converted from guest to staff, a new joiner that is converted to an employee, contracted to end at default retirement age.

user_types.name: ut_ftc
user_types.description: Post asignment after onboarding, converted from guest to staff, a new joiner that is converted to a fixed term contractor, contracted to end based on contract terms.

user_types.name: ut_intern
user_types.description: Post asignment after onboarding, converted from guest to staff, a temporary joiner that is from learning institution, contracted over period of internship.
